thread.section_title: Eclipse Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eclipse Travel | www.eclipsetravel.com.au
thread.title: Mrs Toni Greber
thread.title_full: Eclipse Travel reviewed by Mrs Toni Greber

author: Mrs Toni Greber
title: Mrs Toni Greber
text: In a word- Eclipse travel and our experience with them on our latest fantastic trip to Antarctica/Patagonia was EXCELLENT on every level. . It was a trip of a life time, enhanced by their expertise, friendly advice and information, meticulous organization, great accommodation and attention to detail. Matthew McMillan was also very helpful, attentive and easily contactable when our luggage went AWOL (due to a very delayed Qantas flight) which was out of Eclipse's control. In our experience (on this trip and on our previous trip to the northern part of S America) they have been faultless. We recommend them highly and without reservation .
